price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߞߋ߬ߟߋ߲߬ߞߋ߬ߟߋ߲߬ߠߊ ߝߏߦߌ߬ ߸ ߝߴߏ߬ ߓߍ߯ ߦߋ߫ ߟߊߣߊ߬ ߒ߬ߠߎ߬ ߓߘߊ ߟߋ߬
arabic: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kullun lammā jamīʿun ladaynā muḥ'ḍarūna
